Understates: The claim may understate the fact that Diane Black has voted numerous times to cut off funding for the health-care reforms.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that voting in favor of short-term funding measures allows the funding for Obamacare to continue, without considering the possibility that other actions may have been taken to cut off funding.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Diane Black actively voted to fund Obamacare.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Diane Black has actively voted against funding for Obamacare, as claimed by her campaign spokeswoman.
